headline: Should Investors Revisit Ingersoll Rand After the Recent 8.8% Share Price Slide?
summary: If you are sitting on the fence about Ingersoll Rand, you are definitely not alone. The stock's journey has raised plenty of eyebrows lately, especially with a sharp dip of 8.8% over the past week and a year-to-date drop nearing 16%. On paper, that kind of pullback might look like a red flag, but take a closer look and you will see a company that has still delivered a remarkable 109% total return over the last five years. Even after shedding 25.6% in the past twelve months, longer-term...
